title: Support Unix standard file/line output
body:
Many Unix/Linux programs can handle file/line path literals per double click or right click on it. Usually the format is:

```
/home/foo/bar/baz/b.cc:33
/usr/include/stdio.h:40
```

MSBuild has another format: file(line), please support the Unix/Linux format.

```
C:\Users\foo\baz\baz\b.cc(33)
```
